text: Pymatuning Creek is a long tributary to Shenango River Lake that rises in Ashtabula County, Ohio and flows south into Shenango Lake in Mercer County, Pennsylvania. Pymatuning Creek forms most of the western side of Shenango Lake. Pymatuning Creek has been designated as a Wild & Scenic River in Ohio. ==References== ==External links== *Pymatuning Creek in Ohio *Pymatuning Creek Wild & Scenic River Category:Rivers of Ashtabula County, Ohio Category:Rivers of Mercer County, Pennsylvania Category:Rivers of Ohio Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Rivers of Trumbull County, Ohio
title: Pymatuning Creek
